GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles. Accepts topic query, which serves an array of all articles with the specified topic. Accepts sort_by query, which serves an array of all articles sorted by specified column. Accepts order query, which serves an array of all articles ordered my specified asc or desc.

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object that contains the specified user

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object that contains the specified article

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments on a specified article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Accepts a comment object with a username and body, and serves the posted comment. The user must exist.

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Accepts a votes increment object, and serves the article with the updated votes.

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes the comment by comment_id and serves a status of 204 with no content

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Accepts a votes increment object, and serves the comment with the updated votes.
